actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow a charitable deduction for certain crops furnished by farmers to certain tax-exempt organizations.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow farmers an income tax deduction for the wholesale market value of crops which are not economically feasible for harvesting and are harvested and donated for charitable organizations for use in the organizations' charitable work.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow a charitable deduction for certain crops furnished by farmers to certain tax-exempt organizations.
